name: Contact Form 7 UI
author: Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) | http://orbisius.com

sections.description:
The plugin adds a button in the richtext editor which allows you to easily generate the short code for Contact Form 7 WordPress plugin.
It saves you typing the short codes and therefore reducing the chance of typos.
The plugin is very easy to use. You just select a form from a dropdown and it will generate the necessary shortcode.

Support

If the Contact Form 7 plugin doesn’t work please ask those questions in Contact Form 7‘s forums

If this plugin (Contact Form 7 UI) doesn’t work then use our support forums: http://club.orbisius.com/support/
Please do NOT use the WordPress forums or other places to seek support.
New: We have launched our membership site
which gives you access to all of our premium plugins at an affordable price.

Author

Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) |
Toronto Free Local Classified Ads
sections.installation:
You can either search for the plugin from within WordPress or do the manual upload as follows:
1. Upload contact-form-7-ui.zip into to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: Have any questions or suggestions? Submit them to in our http://club.orbisius.com/support/ forums

short_description: Adds a button in the rich text editor which generates the shortcode for Contact Form 7 forms.
